SELECT fm.id, fm.user_id, fm.name, fm.birthday, fm.relation, fm.work_unit, fm.income,
stui.name, stui.sex, stui.phone, stui.email, stui.images, stui.user_id, ci.name as className, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName FROM family_members fm LEFT JOIN student_info stui ON (stui.id = fm.user_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = stui.major_id) left join class_info ci on (ci.id = stui.class_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.teacher_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND stui.user_id = #{queryParam.userId}
AND stui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.studentName},'%')
ORDER BY stui.id
